review: This device is easy to use and the features are awesome.  I have had Amazon Prime membership for some time, but had not really taken advantage of the video capabilities until recently.  My husband and I got interested in watching the TV series, Sons of Anarchy just before the holiday and were watching on our Ipad.  Then we discovered this nifty device and now we can enjoy our favorite show as well as many other features and cool apps on our big screen TV.  We are very happy with the Amazone Fire TV.  I will say that we've encountered buffering issues now and then, but it's not been major problem.
author: bjc1965
